events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience with software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the process.
The initial screening of your technical background and experience has been completed with promising results.
You responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the role and confirming your availability for further interviews.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next week to assess your coding and problem-solving skills thoroughly.
You completed the technical interview with strong performance, demonstrating expertise in software engineering concepts.
Your HR interview has been arranged to discuss cultural fit and employment terms following the technical round.
You successfully completed the HR interview, showing excellent alignment with company values and expectations.
We have extended an offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits details.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer, confirming your commitment to start as a Software Engineer with the company.
Your onboarding process has begun, including orientation sessions and setup to integrate you swiftly into the engineering team.
The hiring process for your position is now complete; we are excited to have you officially join our engineering department.
